title: Remote-Controlled Airport A Reality In Sweden
teaser: Sweden is the first country in the world to get a remote-controlled airport. That means flights are guided by operators sitting miles away.
contentencoded:
Sweden is the first country in the world to get a remote-controlled airport. That means flights are guided by operators sitting miles away.

This piece originally aired on Morning Edition on Feb. 1, 2015.
